rooms.room_name: Open Plan Kitchen and Living Area
rooms.description: Large open space combining the kitchen and living area with Art Deco accents, high ceilings, and floor-to-ceiling windows enhancing natural light. Features an island counter with integrated storage and seating.
Spacious master bedroom with Art Deco design details, elegant decor, and a private balcony. Includes built-in wardrobe and ambient lighting.
Guest bedroom styled in Art Deco theme with complementary decor. Features a small balcony for personal space.
Cozy study area that doubles as a bachelor den, offering workspace with minimalist Art Deco decor and ample lighting.
Well-equipped bathroom with fixtures and Art Deco tiled accents.
Dedicated storage area for clothing and other personal items, integrated with the living space.

openings.location: Multiple locations with floor-to-ceiling design on living and bedrooms for enhanced natural light
Primary entry door to the penthouse, aligning with Vastu by facing North or East
Each bedroom has a balcony designed for privacy and relaxation, following Vastu principles for air circulation.

design_notes: This floor plan is designed with a total area of 1000 sqft, adhering to local building norms and Vastu principles.
The open-plan kitchen and living area serves as the focal point of the penthouse, ensuring ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows.
Each bedroom includes a private balcony for personal relaxation and improved air circulation as per Vastu guidelines.
